          <title>
            <string language="en">Turning motion of a see-saw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drehenbewegung eines See-saw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement de rotation d'une balançoir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento de giro de um balanço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento di rotazione di un'altalena</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γυρίζοντας κίνηση βλέπει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento que da vuelta de un balancín</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">'First of two illustrations showing movement of a see-saw. This illustration shows the turning motion of the see-saw about a pivot point.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">push</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clockwise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">see-saw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">' zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die Bewegung eines
See-saw zeigen. Diese Abbildung zeigt die drehenbewegung des 
See-saw über einen Gelenkpunkt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">'d'abord de deux illustrations montrant le 
mouvement d'une balançoir. Cette illustration montre le 
mouvement de rotation de la balançoir au sujet d'un point de pivot.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">' primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram
o movimento de um balanço. Esta ilustração mostra o movimento
de giro do balanço sobre um ponto do pivô.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">'in primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano
movimento di un'altalena. Questa illustrazione mostra il 
movimento di rotazione dell'altalena circa un punto del perno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μετακίνηση 
δείτε. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ότι η 
γυρίζοντας κίνηση βλέπει για ένα σημείο άξονα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">' primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran el 
movimiento de un balancín. Esta ilustración muestra el 
movimiento que da vuelta del balancín sobre una punta del pivote.</string>
          </description>
